p:
Weekly CPS, estimated value obtained by spline, and expected value obtained from the mathematical model were used to compare the weekly reported number of influenza cases per sentinel, as shown in Fig. 1. When a chi-square test of goodness of fit was conducted
8, 9 , the deviation between Weekly CPS and estimated value was not significant ( P < 0.05) at all jurisdictions. The estimated value and expected value were in good agreement in any jurisdiction.
